content.raw:
I verbally reported the following to @chapulina:

When editing an existing model, such as the `double_pendulum_with_base`, rescaling a link with multiple collisions / visuals causes the following message to be printed one time:

~~~
[Wrn] [MEUserCmdManager.cc:312] Number of scale operations before and after command are different, some visuals or collisions might be scaled wrong.
~~~

Subsequent re-scalings of that link do not print the message.
content.html:
I verbally reported the following to @chapulina:

When editing an existing model, such as the double_pendulum_with_base, rescaling a link with multiple collisions / visuals causes the following message to be printed one time:

[Wrn] [MEUserCmdManager.cc:312] Number of scale operations before and after command are different, some visuals or collisions might be scaled wrong.

Subsequent re-scalings of that link do not print the message.
